posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!

Welcome to V Lane Apartments, tucked away in the center of Paradise, offering 1 and 2 bedroom Las Vegas, Nevada apartments for rent.
At V Lane Apartments, you will enjoy tranquil living in the city that never sleeps.
Our community offers plenty of amenities so you can live a resort-style life and feel the comfort of home.
We are excited to announce changes happening at V Lane Apartments.
Tucked away in the center of paradise you will enjoy a dip in our newly renovated resort-style swimming pool or work up a sweat in our fully equipped 24-hour fitness center.
We love our pets and are happy to invite you to our new Bark Park for all our furry residents.
